name: Book a 10to8 appointment from a Telegram message
description:
Every time a new message is received in a Telegram channel, Make will automatically book a new 10to8 appointment.

Your Telegram Bot has to be a member of that channel and a message needs to be in this format (with comma separator): name, email, date (DD.MM.YYYY), time (am/pm). Example:

John Keats, keats@email.com, 25.02.2021, 10:00 am
